name: Hints
description: Cyclically display a hint from a list of hints on an interval to the whole server.
author: x

authorized.description: A list of players authorized to use hint modification commands.

display-interval.description: How often to display a hint, in seconds.

prefix.description: A prefix placed before all hints to display. If left blank, no prefix will be used.

file.description: The name of the file to read hints from. This is relative to your Omegga installation. Read the README from the GitHub page for more information on how this works.

commands.name: /hints add
commands.description: Add a hint to the list of hints.
commands.example: /hints add This is a new hint!

commands.name: /hints remove
commands.description: Remove a hint by its index.

commands.name: /hints edit
commands.description: Edit a hint by its index, followed by its new content.
commands.example: /hints edit 1 This is the new hint content.

commands.name: /hints reload
commands.description: Reload hints from the hints file.
